content.text: Hi there, I'm going to be visiting Japan soon, do you have any suggestions for places to go?
I've never been to Japan, but I have heard that Kyoto is a beautiful city.
That does sound beautiful! I'm also interested in learning more about their culture and history.
Oh that's great! I have a lot of friends who are really interested in Japanese culture. I'm sure they could help you out with that.
Oh that would be awesome! Thank you!
No problem! I'm glad I could help.
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I love to pottery and photograph everyday life. I also have a few dogs that I love to take care of.
That sounds really interesting! I've always wanted to learn how to pottery.
It's really fun! I'm self-taught, so it's definitely possible to learn without taking classes.
Oh that's great! I'll have to look into it.
Yeah, it's really rewarding to see your work come together.
Well, I should probably get going. It was really nice talking to you!
You too! Have a great trip to Japan!
